attributes.additional_details: Ibd is a lifelong chronic illness that often requires other medications to deal with the system disease , with continuing prescriptions to pay for and difficulty in keeping a job through Illness and mounting everyday cost of living having free prescriptions for a disease not brought on by oneself or have a choice in I feel it’s only fair

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Free prescriptions for those with a long term and/or chronic condition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608237
